entry.title: High functioning depression.

Author: igve

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,610Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Ongoing partnership between Superman and Batman makes everone hopeful, lighting citizens days.Clark is an investigative reporter, that so happened to uncover the fact that Bruce Wayne is smarter than he looks and presents himself to be in publics eye.Bruce is on and about to keep his secrects to himself, but the reporter is really nosy.(I'm so bad at the summaries...)
